thread.section_title: AmigoAutos.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre AmigoAutos.com | www.amigoautos.com
thread.title: Boris

author: Boris
title: Boris
text:
I returned the car at AutoClick Alicante office on 12.10.2016 according to the rental agreement. There was a parking accident with a small damages on the car. I applied the papers about the accident to start the procedure to recovery at the same office before to return the car on 11.10.2016.
My credit card is charged with 1013 euro on 13.10.2016. Still this amount is missing from the credit card more than 3 moths.
It is apparent that everything is in order about the insurance to recover the damage.
All the details are available at the Police station Valencia.
